website_summaries.verdict: This motion light is great if you want a leave it and forget it option.
pros: Green light only is an option
Light sensors turn it off in the day and on at night
cons: Not as many color or setting options as some others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and does not last- Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in September for 33% more than it can be bought today for use at Christmas (now). after 1 week of use the Green laser is now not working and the Red is not very showy. It now costs as much to ship back as buying a new one...pretty bad for 1 weeks use so beware...I would not purchase again especially from Amazon. If you purchase locally at a big box at least they would give you your money back without charging you for shipping the defective back Worst Amazon purchase since 1999
customer_reviews.author: jsauer750

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all year round.
customer_reviews.text: We use this light all season. When camping it lights up the trees like lightning bugs!
customer_reviews.author: T. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Bad Improvements
customer_reviews.text: This new and improved version has a terrible cord for the outdoor use. It needs to go back to the thick and longer cord. Please send one?
customer_reviews.author: T. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good review
customer_reviews.text: Our green light doesn't work at all on one and the other flickers on and off. Not our best purchase :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't Expecting this Pattern, But Great Product
customer_reviews.text: No product we have investigated gives the look of fireflies in the trees more than this one. It is bright, and being a laser, goes quite far (hopefully not too far to cause problems in the air). We had seen the product in action at a campsite in Florida. One issue of concern is that it doesn't turn off with first light. It is quite bright outside before it turns off for the day. The other thing is that we were not expecting a pattern of squares to show up in its cycle of projection. We deal with it for the rest of the display--quite beautiful. But wish the squares weren't so prominent.
customer_reviews.author: Full Circle

customer_reviews.title: Wrong unit not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: 2nd attempt to write a review (first one was not published). The unit I received was NOT the Star Shower Motion Laser Light,,,,,,,but a cheaper version the Star Slide Projector. As I have a few of these illuminating my house, this would produce a completely different effect.
customer_reviews.author: TEF3

customer_reviews.title: Bad!
customer_reviews.text: First of all this product is 4 times more than the exact star shooter at Home Depot. Second, it was defective so started the return process, it stated if opened there would be a 50% restocking fee. It took Amazon Customer Service to get involved in order for me to get a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ambience
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to sitting on our deck at night. This twinkles in all the surrounding bushes and trees!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki H.

customer_reviews.title: One-Story Home Can Complicate Matters
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because I live in a major metro area with multiple airports nearby. The user manual warns that this laser product is hazardous to aircraft within approximately three miles. If you can keep the beams from aiming into the sky, then this is a really nice product. I just couldn't make that happen because I have a one-story home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these at night
customer_reviews.text: They were so awesome that someone stole them out of our yard at our old house. Thankfully they are reasonable enough that we replaced them. Our granddaughter loves them. You will need a few sets if your house exterior is large and you want to cover it well or you have a large enough yard to move the projector far away from the house.
customer_reviews.author: jolie's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Love this, I wish they made an option with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks as expected and as described. Love this, I wish they made an option with just white color, o think people would leave them up pointing on their trees and palm trees in their backyards all year round! Love this especially on the trees. Looks like million little twinkling lights on the leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Verkas

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in these lights. I thought they would bathe the front of our house in a sparkling light show, but no...can't even see them until your are right in front of the structure, and even then you need to look hard to see that there are lights happening. Also, our box was missing the spike that goes into the ground, so the unit is sitting on top of the lawn on the base meant for indoor use :-( . Eh...
customer_reviews.author: madagogo

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Be Happier!
customer_reviews.text: Received a unit that stopped working correctly after two days. Seller sent out a new unit in a day or two and did not even require return of the defective one. Use the new unit and two others I bought in my wooded backyard. The effect on a summer night is fabulous. Spend the extra dollars and get the MOTION version. It is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Turbitt

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 working lights
customer_reviews.text: These come 2 in a pack. Immediately 1 had a burned out red led; only to use the green light. The other light worked fine with both red & green. I waited past the 30 days which was Oct to Dec to put up Xmas lights; could not return. Will trash this one light. Next time hit up Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: april ellis

customer_reviews.title: Pros & Cons
customer_reviews.text: It's OK Pros: Easy setup. Not too expensive. Lights are bright indoors. Lights OK outdoors but tends to fade with street lights. Cons: Snow cover will block light from exiting the laser. Light sensor does not work very well. My outdoor unit would not shut off until after noon when direct sunlight hit it. Does not work very well with electrical timer.
customer_reviews.author: FMG

customer_reviews.title: Discount coupon misleading- Inferior product sent when you reorder
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work properly. I ordered one early December and it works great! Ordered a second one using a coupon that came in the original order package and it looks similar but is inferior in quality. Lights don't move at all. A bit misleading if you think your ordering another light.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Awesome decoration. This is a great invention. Now I can have Christmas lights without having to untangle them first, test them and then string them up on the roofline. This "plug and play" is a much better solution. Takes minutes to put up and take down without sacrificing my safety by getting up and down on the ladder multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: K Lawson

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to find this as it matches the one I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this as it matches the one I bought last year. The price is excellent. I really like this version of star shower because the pattern is very subtle and doesn't move too fast. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: This was to entertain grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get this for decoration but for a laser light show one evening with grandkids. They took turns shining on everything and each other. The lights or all green or combo of green and red. We even used in the house playing games with it. It is as described and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ABjones

customer_reviews.title: This star light shower is awesome. This one product saved me time and money
customer_reviews.text: This star light shower is awesome. This one product saved me time and money. Easy to setup...in minutes. I will recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ronil

customer_reviews.title: Designed themselves out of customers
customer_reviews.text: The original design was MUCH better. These move which can give you a headache. Also, you have to click again & again & again to get it to what you want. Except for one setting, they are so juvenile that if you don't have a first-grade child, it is useless to you. The plainer one was a thousand time better.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them so much, I bought them twice! Hint to other buyers: don't project them on a flat surface -- we projected ours into our garden rather than onto our house, and the garden looks like "A Midsummer Night's Dream" -- the neighbors loved it so much, they bought it, too!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Star Shower Motion Laser Light by BulbHead  Awful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light in Jan. 2018 so it was after Christmas. I did not open the box until this week. First the light wouldn't screw into the stake. Then I duck taped it so I could use it and it worked the first night but now only has a red light that only moves very slowly. This is trash!! What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: but because I loved them so much I wanted to cover even more ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw these at my daughter's and had to have some here. Put them up and decided I need twice the amount, not because they didn't cover the area promised, but because I loved them so much I wanted to cover even more area. So pretty and so easy!
customer_reviews.author: DH - SWFL

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, not bad for $20. Would recommend buying two and put one in stop position and the other in motion. Looks cool when pointed at tree
customer_reviews.author: snicklefritz

customer_reviews.title: It is like having a yard full of fireflies
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I have it pointed up at a large oak tree in our back yard. When you set it to green only, it looks like the tree is filled with fireflies. Works way better than you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: swoodapple

customer_reviews.title: only the red works, not the green
customer_reviews.text: not good, the green doesn't work,, only the red. very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: elvissnme

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I love lighting my palm tree With this light year round. Never get tired of it. Wish they came in more colors besides green and red .
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Hey your stars are green  !!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ours only lasted 2 years. However ours were on in those 2 years. When they did die it was sr The smaller box
customer_reviews.author: Honeybunny

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY....
customer_reviews.text: I had already purchased one of the star showers from Home Depot on clearance for just $12.97...a GREAT bargain. When I went back, they were all gone, so I purchased one from you at a good discount. I LOVE the Star Shower Motion. With two of them, it is so beautiful on my house. I have them set up much closer (about 10 feet, so they are really bright and gorgeous on the house). i can't wait until next season to put them up. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: longear

customer_reviews.title: Christmas must have. New Tradition in our house.
customer_reviews.text: I owned one for the front needed one for the back. I dont direct it towards the house. I light up the trees with them. Beautiful! The other brands do house only! Do the trees looks way cooler
customer_reviews.author: MaryS

customer_reviews.title: Great atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Great summer time lights shining up into our woods. They look like fireflies twinkling.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Giant “Laser”
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Super easy to set up and it blankets the front of the house with moving green and red dots.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Flireflies!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these and use camping. It looks like a million fireflies up in the trees when set up and pointed in that direction. Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and as promised!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, arrived on time and as promised. I had this stolen off of my porch! Seller had no problem replacing this. This was perfect for my outdoor christmas lights combined with Star Shower Slideshow...AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in used/opened box and power cable way too short
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a box that was obviously returned (previous buyer wrote “Broken Damaged” on the box), and there was no additional packaging (mailing sticker was slapped straight onto the box). Also the power cable is extremely short (less than a foot) and was a bit frayed on the ends. It did power on, and functions, but not sure how long it will last :(
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: The light display was cool and it covered quite a distance
customer_reviews.text: We used this laser light throughout the holidays 24/7 for at least 30 days with no issues and with snow, rain and freezing temps. The light display was cool and it covered quite a distance. MB
customer_reviews.author: M. Bracke

customer_reviews.title: Best Price
customer_reviews.text: Needed another to cover outside front of house and this was the best price. Works very well!
customer_reviews.author: wimom

customer_reviews.title: Friggin lasers
customer_reviews.text: Friggin' lasers and Xmas. Two of my favorite things! If you live on a well lit street, you'd probably be better off getting a few of these and putting them closer to the house. My street is dark and I can set it a decent ways back. Might add a second at some point to increase brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. No problems, but I took unit inside the house every night when i went to bed. Good construction. Friends & neighbors loved it so much they bought some. :D
customer_reviews.author: Paul De La Vergne

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I have it set up in my lanai, and I turn it on every night. This is my own disco lights!
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaVA

customer_reviews.title: Outside shower of lights
customer_reviews.text: It is very good Only thing I don’t like is that it doesn’t turn off after it gets light outside But it’s no big thing Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Montae

customer_reviews.title: Red does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Love the showers in green. Even though I read the instructions from front to back I saw that the spot for the red bulb was not working. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Organ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item.
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly as advertised. Very bright lights and covers a lot of area. I reordered these because someone was nice enough to steal the ones I had originally bought.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product But Not Available Anymore for $29.00
customer_reviews.text: Great fun take camping. We tried to buy another one but the price has doubled. Glad we got one for a good price though!
customer_reviews.author: peacefultimes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: 1st time trying a laser light for Xmas decorating and im very pleased . Light are Sharp and clear. The ever changing design very nice.Now we have lights all over the front of house and for once no ladders were used yaaaaaaaa.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Little

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: . awesome, Awesome! AWESOME!!! I bought one, then, another, and another, and then bought 3 more. All of my palm trees here in Cocoa Beach are shimmering and dancing in light 365 nights a year. I'm sure I will buy more and even have had friends order some since they saw my display.
customer_reviews.author: WILL THERRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and say goodbye to string lights
customer_reviews.text: Why I didn't buy one of these 10 years ago I will never know. Go from zero to the most festive house on the street in less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Great item. My son wanted this for inside. Works great, lights up entire house. Cannot wait to use it outside next Christmas. Great price. I thought these things would cost $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Great, using it in my front yard. The ambience that it has created is beyond awesome. Recommend that everyone buy this product and install in their front yard this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The projection on this product is unbelievable! I have had my original one for 3years and it has been outside unprotected all this time. Just purchased another one for my backyard. The neighbors love it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Diane Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Just one of the star showers lit up my house ...
customer_reviews.text: Just one of the star showers lit up my house. I used a timer and plugged it in for hours of operation. I was very impressed with how well it lit up the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact I did not have to get my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I did not have to get my ass on the the roof this year . I never like dealing with the edge of the roof and a thin wire and a ladder. That to me is a ticket to the hospital. Now the product that you all have I can have the lights up in a hr and more time to spend with the family! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: product was as stated
customer_reviews.text: MFG needs to make the power line stronger where it plugs into the light. Wiring is too small and will break .
customer_reviews.author: webarth47

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Bright and reliable. Was a great addition to Christmas decorations. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Kim

customer_reviews.title: The red and green lights are beautiful in are pine trees short life cold temperatures cord ...
customer_reviews.text: The red and green lights are beautiful in are pine trees short life cold temperatures cord brakes off if you move it at all
customer_reviews.author: T. D. Anthes

customer_reviews.title: seem to work great. Picked one up myself
customer_reviews.text: Neighbor has 4 of them, seem to work great. Picked one up myself, very bright.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Light Up Your Trees With Class
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. Making plans to purchase additional lights. We like the sensor that turns them off during the day and pops them on at night.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Lights
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. These are great! And at a good price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Um no thanks. Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: There is a strong possibility of blinding you or your animals! Why is this legal? Finding a place where eyes won't come in contact is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only covers a small portion of your house! Some people must have 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Djamila Reed-McRae

customer_reviews.title: Light Up My Life
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted one of these light projectors. It was very easy to setup and use. I like the sensor that turned it off automatically in the morning. It really made my children and my cat's very happy.
customer_reviews.author: teacher mom

customer_reviews.title: bought before
customer_reviews.text: newer versions have a definite STUTTER to the animation - noticeable
customer_reviews.author: daron d sneed

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these and I love them. They worked in snow and negative temps ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and I love them. They worked in snow and negative temps - in Wyoming! because of the snow we did have to attach them to fence post stakes but they worked beautifully and I enjoyed coming home each evening and seeing these lights on the house.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: The spear accessory it comes with for exteriors is made of terrible quality, broke in the first attempt to stick in the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Pondo

customer_reviews.title: I really like the effect it has created in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: I really like the effect it has created in my backyard. I would definitely recommend it t o my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well; we did all green for Ramadan - ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well; we did all green for Ramadan - you probably need two for an average to above average home front.
customer_reviews.author: anooru1

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cheap!! But make sure to heavily tape the molded connections . . . as they will "break" in cold weather and short out and destroy the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Gaudin

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Big hit with my neighbors for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Big hit with my neighbors for Christmas. Works best if you mount it about 6 feet off the ground and point toward your home.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lights worked properly with the timer system, no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. M

customer_reviews.title: We thoroughly enjoyed this throughout the Christmas season
customer_reviews.text: We thoroughly enjoyed this throughout the Christmas season, and have even made a place for it in our home, for occasional illumination...
customer_reviews.author: Gene C. Bammel

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday decoration.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in our holiday decorations. This thing lights up really nice. The lasers go a long way and look really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, but it would be nice to have a cord longer than six inches.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, but it would be nice to have a cord longer than six inches.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Super great quality for a lower price
customer_reviews.text: Super great quality for a lower price.Bright laser, consistent performance. It covered the entire front of my 3400sq ft house.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: awesome deal on an awesome product
customer_reviews.text: awesome deal on an awesome product. i live on a secluded road, and with the 6, i have my house lit from 3 sides + the trees on the other side of the road.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mankowski

customer_reviews.title: love it. I purchased one
customer_reviews.text: love it. I purchased one, I liked it so much I got another. perfect for me. I opened the box, took out the item..removed the laser sticker, adjusted it to where I want the lights, plugged in.that's it! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Likey!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It gave me a great deal of pleasure. I wish it actually did turn off during the day though
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Very festive!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this projector for the last two Christmas holidays and they add a lot of dazzle to our yard decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Jody W.

customer_reviews.title: Dazzling effect worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. I use them as up lighst on my trees and palms to create a dazzling effect. I love the green only color option, so that it is not too Christmasy looking. It looks like fire flies!! I use them all year round.
customer_reviews.author: gus orozco

customer_reviews.title: Easy Christmas Lighting
customer_reviews.text: No more strands of lights for me, got 2 & they light up the trees in my front yard. Just Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P. Mcadams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best in Christmas light decorating. No hassle and no climbing ladders. I encourage everyone to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great buy especially for the price. Used it on our two story house and lit it up very well. With two settings on the lights (green or green and red) and the ability to make them move or not move it’s definitely ideal. Love the product would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectation after seeing one operate at a campsite ...
customer_reviews.text: Meets my expectation after seeing one operate at a campsite I was at recently. Seems to have motion activated even after unplugging for a few minutes. Will try it on a timer next. Will most likely be picking up another one or two.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf11

customer_reviews.title: The motion one is great
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves it. Looks so nice and bright. Bought 3 but they sent one thy I didn't order and I sent back. Has to be motion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so fun to use at the campground at night shining at the trees.

customer_reviews.title: Dam good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase. Easy to set up and has a huge range of coverage on the home. Highly recommended!!!

customer_reviews.title: Greatest
customer_reviews.text: I bring it camping , it’s nice to see the lights shining in the trees. We do the same thing in our backyard, it’s so beautiful seeing the lights at night glimmering in the trees 😊

customer_reviews.title: Daylight sensor does not work well
customer_reviews.text: The daylight sensor does not work great and the laser lights would often not turn off at sunrise but still a good product.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working during inaugural season
customer_reviews.text: Worked at first but didn’t make it thru on Ohio winter. Disappointed

customer_reviews.text: We already have 2. Gift for friend. Brings joy to see dancing lights in the yard

customer_reviews.title: Great value and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These things are great and what a great price when you buy 6

customer_reviews.title: looks nice .
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice but sometimes no red lights right away until it warms up.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are so much fun......I wish they came in colors that I could use all year.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Like both base and spike included.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy to install and you can change ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, easy to install and you can change the settings. If you have a 2 story home you made need to order two. I only ordered one and it doesn't cover the whole house

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. So easy to set up and very beautiful especially when directed at tall trees.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: unit worked great easy to set up and made a beautiful display

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy your Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Red color laser is not as bright as the green color one... But this doesn't matter for loving the results you'll get with these Christmas lights

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we already had one so we bought another to put in the yard. Grandson loves them

product_meta.title: Star Shower Motion Laser Light by BulbHead - Indoor Outdoor Laser Light for Hassle-Free Holiday Decorating – Sparking or Still Red and Green Laser Lights Cover up to 3200 Square Feet
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackStar Shower Motion dazzling holiday laser light show will make your house the talk of the town without any tangled lights or cumbersome installation. This plug and play projector includes two light choices, sparkling red and green or all green, and two modes for dancing or still lights to accommodate the mood of any occasion. No matter what you choose, Star Shower Motion is sure to impress.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars444 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
